name: Modul-347 Levin Fankhauser
postCreateCommand:
npm install && curl -sSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-6.0.asc | gpg --dearmor > /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-archive-keyring.gpg \
    && echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-archive-keyring.gpg] http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian ${VERSION_CODENAME}/mongodb-org/6.0 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-6.0.list \
    && apt-get update && export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive \
    && apt-get install -y mongodb-mongosh \
    && if [ "$(dpkg --print-architecture)" = "amd64" ]; then apt-get install -y mongodb-database-tools; fi \
    && apt-get clean -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && node init-db.js
